#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
main(){
    int n,q;
    cin>>n>>q;
    int i;
    vector<int> v;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++){
        v.push_back(i);
        cin>>v[i];
    }
    sort(v.begin(),v.end());
    int x,minimum,maximum;
    minimum=v[0];
    maximum=v[v.size()-1];
    while(q!=0){
        cin>>x;
        if((x>=minimum)&&(x<=maximum))
        {
                cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
                q--;
        }
        else{
            cout<<"No"<<endl;
            q--;
        }
    }

}
